```{python}
#| title: Seattle Inventory
import pandas as pd
data_code = "invt_fs/Metro_invt_fs_uc_sfrcondo_sm_month"
args = {
    "filepath_or_buffer" : f"https://files.zillowstatic.com/research/public_csvs/{data_code}.csv",
    "index_col" : [0,1,2,3,4],
 }
dat = pd.read_csv(**args)
regions = ["Seattle, WA"]
fixed = dat[dat.index.get_level_values("RegionName").isin(regions)].T
fixed.index = pd.to_datetime(fixed.index)
fixed.columns = [data_code]
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
plt.rcParams['figure.figsize'] = (16, 3)
fixed.plot(title="Seattle Housing Inventory");
```
